cast.overview: Abandoned by her family, Kya raises herself all alone in the marshes outside of her small town. When her former boyfriend is found dead, Kya is instantly branded by the local townspeople and law enforcement as the prime suspect for his murder.
cast.title: Where the Crawdads Sing

cast.overview: After their late former Captain is framed, Lowrey and Burnett try to clear his name, only to end up on the run themselves.
cast.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die

details.biography:
Jerri Tubbs is an American actress known for her work in film and television. With a career spanning decades, she has appeared in a variety of roles across genres, earning recognition for her versatility and talent.

Jerri Tubbs was born in Newburgh, Indiana, and raised in San Jose, California. She later moved to Los Angeles to pursue her passion for acting and earned her Master of Fine Arts (MFA) in Acting from UCLA. Tubbs further refined her craft by training with renowned acting coach Ivana Chubbuck at her studio in Hollywood.

Tubbs began her acting career with appearances in television series such as Stranger Things, Into the Badlands, and Ozark. Over the years, she built a diverse portfolio, appearing in productions like The Walking Dead (as Margo), Cobra Kai (as Nurse Patricia), and P-Valley (as Tripp's Mama). Her film credits include roles in Logan Lucky (2017), Where the Crawdads Sing (2022), and Bad Boys: Ride or Die (2024).
details.name: Jerri Tubbs
